results.title: Hemodynamically-directed atenolol therapy is associated with a blunted rise in maternal sFLT-1 levels during pregnancy.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: Cardiac output and sFlt-1 are elevated prior to clinical evidence of @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@preeclampsia@@@. Early treatment of @DISEASE_Cardiac_Output_High @DISEASE_MESH:D016534 @@@high cardiac output@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ decreases the risk for @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@preeclampsia@@@.

results.title: Circulatory and metabolic effects of acute beta 1-blockade in severe pre-eclampsia.
results.text_hl: Five mg of a @GENE_ADRB1 @GENE_153 @@@beta 1-adrenoceptor@@@ antagonist (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@) was given i.v. to 5 women with severe @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@pre-eclampsia@@@ in the 3rd trimester of pregnancy.

results.title: Hypertension in pregnancy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ is currently being evaluated in combination with @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ to treat cases of early onset of severe @<m>DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@pre-eclampsia@@@, and preliminary results are encouraging.
